verses.verse: Behold <WH2896>, how good and how pleasant <WH5273> it is for brothers <WH251> to live <WH3427> together <WH3162> in unity <WH3162>!

It is like the precious <WH2896> ointment <WH8081> upon the head <WH7218>, that ran down <WH3381> upon the beard <WH2206>, even Aaron <WH175>'s beard <WH2206>: that went down <WH3381> to the skirts <WH6310> of his garments <WH4060>;

As the dew <WH2919> of Hermon <WH2768>, and as the dew that descended <WH3381> upon the mountains <WH2042> of Zion <WH6726>: for there the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> the blessing <WH1293>, even life <WH2416> for evermore <WH5769>.
